solution.text: To represent the given equation, \(x = _{k}_\) in one variable, there is no need to draw a Cartesian plane and we will use a number line as shown below. \(x = _{k}_\) is represented by the red dot on the line.

content.text: Select the correct geometric representation of the equation \(x = _{k}_\) in ONE variable.
